item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 22, 2024 at 1:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. A data table thousands of years old (2020) (73 points | 17 comments)
2. Translating 10M lines of Java to Kotlin (49 points | 32 comments)
3. Dividing unsigned 8-bit numbers (89 points | 49 comments)
4. City Roads: A tool to draw all roads in a city at once (93 points | 14 comments)
5. Query Apple's FindMy network with Python (304 points | 135 comments)
6. Enum of Arrays (52 points | 9 comments)
7. Ideas from "A Philosophy of Software Design" (56 points | 33 comments)
8. Show HN: Rivet Actors – Durable Objects build with Rust, FoundationDB, Isolates (66 points | 16 comments)
9. Show HN: Eonfall – A new third-person co-op action game built for the web (128 points | 73 comments)
10. A curious case of O(N^2) behavior which should be O(N) (2023) (17 points | 1 comment)
11. Grammarly acquires Coda (82 points | 46 comments)
12. How we made our AI code review bot stop leaving nitpicky comments (64 points | 34 comments)
13. Train a Mnist VAE with C and CUDA (7 points | discuss)
14. Show HN: Demo of my web game about social persuasion (40 points | 16 comments)
15. US judge finds NSO Group liable for hacking journalists via WhatsApp (457 points | 137 comments)
16. JEP 483: Ahead-of-Time Class Loading and Linking (23 points | discuss)
17. Spherical Harmonics (12 points | 12 comments)
18. Richard Bellman on the Birth of Dynamic Programming (2002) [pdf] (6 points | discuss)
19. Wuppertal's suspended monorail proved its doubters wrong [video] (33 points | 11 comments)
20. Magical Thinking: Edward Bellamy's Looking Backward (2011) (9 points | 1 comment)
21. Language and Personality (4 points | discuss)
22. Show HN: Get e-signatures & pay per signed doc (16 points | 26 comments)
23. More than 140 Kenya Facebook moderators sue after diagnoses of PTSD (157 points | 107 comments)
24. Generate Color Palettes from Text (10 points | 4 comments)
25. Turing Machines (55 points | 19 comments)
26. Talking over a wall changed my direction as a programmer (46 points | 30 comments)
27. Cqd: Colour my __dir__ please (9 points | 2 comments)
28. Introducing S2 (227 points | 119 comments)
29. The CD Pipeline Manifesto (34 points | 15 comments)
30. How the Samuel Smith beer baron built Britain's strangest pub chain (64 points | 30 comments)
